preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 16 g of Boron powder. 
 2. Weigh out 200 g of Iron powder. 
 3. Weigh out 40 g of Magnesium powder. 
 4. Weigh out 20 g of Manganese powder. 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine the weighed powders thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer to ensure uniform distribution.
